name: Ace Defense
description:
★ Ace Defense ★

-Features-

• 5 unique tower types to construct.

• 10 winding paths to defend.

• 35 enemy types to annihilate.

• 8 bonus crates to pick up.

Don't forget to use the feedback button to let us know what YOU WANT.



-Background-

We have just finished our research into five ultimate weapons, each more powerful and complex than the last.

They are expensive to produce and funds are low. Worst of all, a foreign military has been informed our work. Naturally, the spy responsible for that has been found and executed but the fact remains that we are now under siege.

We must use our new weapons to defend our work and protect our research. We will be able to ransack enemies for cash to fund further development once we have... ahem.... incapacitated each enemy.

We’ve heard that the enemy will regularly take time to regroup, but that means that they will be stronger each time they attack as they learn how to navigate paths and dodge attacks. Bearing that in mind, we have constant need to be on our toes to find new ways to battle and defend.

The enemy will learn of the several paths into the facility. Watch out for them coming in from new directions and defend accordingly.

Now hurry! There isn’t long...
